actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend until the close of December 31, 1978, the duty on certain field glasses, opera glasses, binoculars and other telescopes.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend until December 31, 1978, the customs duties on field glasses, opera glasses, binoculars, and other telescopes not designed for use with infra-red light.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend until the close of December 31, 1978, the duty on certain field glasses, opera glasses, binoculars and other telescopes.
